verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Fifth <S%G3991><s%> Angel <S%G32><s%> Sounded His Trumpet; <S%G4537><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> I Saw <S%G1492><s%> A Star <S%G792><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%> Fallen <S%G4098><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth, <S%G1093><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> There Was Given <S%G1325><s%> To It <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Key <S%G2807><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Pit <S%G5421><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Abyss. <S%G12><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> It Opened <S%G455><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Pit <S%G5421><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Abyss; <S%G12><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> There Went Up <S%G305><s%> Smoke <S%G2586><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Pit <S%G5421><s%> As The <S%G5613><s%> Smoke <S%G2586><s%> Of A Furnace <S%G2575><s%> Great; <S%G3173><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Was Darkened <S%G4654><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sun <S%G2246><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Air <S%G109><s%> By <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Smoke <S%G2586><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Pit. <S%G5421><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Out <S%G1537><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Smoke <S%G2586><s%> Came Forth <S%G1831><s%> Locusts <S%G200><s%> Unto <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth, <S%G1093><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Was Given <S%G1325><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> Power, <S%G1849><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Have <S%G2192><s%> Power <S%G1849><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Scorpions <S%G4651><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Earth; <S%G1093><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> It Was Said <S%G4483><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> They Should Injure <S%G91><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Grass <S%G5528><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Earth, <S%G1093><s%> Nor <S%G3761><s%> Any <S%G3956><s%> Green Thing, <S%G5515><s%> Nor <S%G3761><s%> Any <S%G3956><s%> Tree, <S%G1186><s%> <S%G1487><s%> But <S%G3361><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Men <S%G444><s%> Only <S%G3441><s%> Who <S%G3748><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Have Not <S%G2192><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Seal <S%G4973><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Foreheads <S%G3359><s%> Their. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> It Was Given <S%G1325><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361><s%> They Should Not Kill <S%G615><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> They Should Be Tormented <S%G928><s%> Months <S%G3376><s%> Five; <S%G4002><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Torment <S%G929><s%> Their <S%G846><s%> Was As The <S%G5613><s%> Torment <S%G929><s%> Of A Scorpion, <S%G4651><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> It May Strike <S%G3817><s%> A Man. <S%G444><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2250><s%> Those Days <S%G1565><s%> Shall Seek <S%G2212><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Men <S%G444><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Death, <S%G2288><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Shall Find <S%G2147><s%> It; <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Shall Desire <S%G1937><s%> To Die, <S%G599><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Shall Flee <S%G5343><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Death <S%G2288><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> Them. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Likenesses <S%G3667><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Locusts Were <S%G200><s%> Like <S%G3664><s%> To Horses <S%G2462><s%> Prepared <S%G2090><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> War, <S%G4171><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2776><s%> Their Heads <S%G846><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Crowns <S%G4735><s%> Like <S%G3664><s%> Gold; <S%G5557><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4383><s%> Their Faces <S%G846><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Faces <S%G4383><s%> Of Men; <S%G444><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> They Had <S%G2192><s%> Hair <S%G2359><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Hair <S%G2359><s%> Women's; <S%G1135><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Teeth <S%G3599><s%> Their <S%G846><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Of Lions <S%G3023><s%> Were; <S%G2258><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> They Had <S%G2192><s%> Breastplates <S%G2382><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Breastplates <S%G2382><s%> Iron; <S%G4603><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sound <S%G5456><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4420><s%> Of Their Wings <S%G846><s%> Was As The <S%G5613><s%> Sound <S%G5456><s%> Of Chariots <S%G716><s%> Of Horses <S%G2462><s%> Many <S%G4183><s%> Running <S%G5143><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> War; <S%G4171><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> They Have <S%G2192><s%> Tails <S%G3769><s%> Like <S%G3664><s%> Scorpions, <S%G4651><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Stings; <S%G2759><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Tails <S%G3769><s%> Their <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1849><s%> Their Power <S%G846><s%> To Injure <S%G91><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Men <S%G444><s%> Months <S%G3376><s%> Five. <S%G4002><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> They Have <S%G2192><s%> ' Over <S%G1909><s%> Them <S%G848><s%> A King, <S%G935><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Angel <S%G32><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Abyss : <S%G12><s%> <S%G3686><s%> His Name <S%G846><s%> In Hebrew <S%G1447><s%> Abaddon, <S%G3><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Greek <S%G1673><s%> For Name <S%G3686><s%> He Has <S%G2192><s%> Apollyon. <S%G623><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sixth <S%G1623><s%> Angel <S%G32><s%> Sounded His Trumpet; <S%G4537><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> I Heard <S%G191><s%> Voice <S%G5456><s%> <S%G1520><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Four <S%G5064><s%> Horns <S%G2768><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Altar <S%G2379><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Golden <S%G5552><s%> Which Is <S%G3588><s%> Before <S%G1799><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%>

Saying <S%G3004><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Sixth <S%G1623><s%> Angel <S%G32><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Had <S%G2192><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Trumpet, <S%G4536><s%> Loose <S%G3089><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Four <S%G5064><s%> Angels <S%G32><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Are Bound <S%G1210><s%> At <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> River <S%G4215><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Great <S%G3173><s%> Euphrates. <S%G2166><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Were Loosed <S%G3089><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Four <S%G5064><s%> Angels <S%G32><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Had Been Prepared <S%G2090><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Hour <S%G5610><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Month <S%G3376><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Year, <S%G1763><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> They Might Kill <S%G615><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Third <S%G5154><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Men; <S%G444><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Number <S%G706><s%> Of The Armies <S%G4753><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Cavalry Was <S%G2461><s%> Two <S%G1417><s%> Myriads <S%G3461><s%> Of Myriads, <S%G3461><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> I Heard <S%G191><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Number <S%G706><s%> Of Them. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Thus <S%G3779><s%> I Saw <S%G1492><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Horses <S%G2462><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Vision, <S%G3706><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> Sitting <S%G2521><s%> ' On <S%G1909><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> Breastplates <S%G2382><s%> Fiery, <S%G4447><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Hyacinthine, <S%G5191><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Brimstone Like; <S%G2306><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heads <S%G2776><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Horses Were <S%G2462><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Heads <S%G2776><s%> Of Lions, <S%G3023><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4750><s%> Their Mouths <S%G846><s%> Goes Out <S%G1607><s%> Fire <S%G4442><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Smoke <S%G2586><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Brimstone. <S%G2303><s%>

By <S%G5259><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Three <S%G5140><s%> These <S%G5130><s%> Were Killed <S%G615><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Third <S%G5154><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Men, <S%G444><s%> By <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Fire <S%G4442><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> By <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Smoke <S%G2586><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> By <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Brimstone, <S%G2303><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Goes Forth <S%G1607><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4750><s%> Their Mouths. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> For The <S%G1063><s%> Powers <S%G1849><s%> Of Them <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Mouth <S%G4750><s%> Their <S%G846><s%> Are; <S%G1526><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3769><s%> For Their Tails <S%G846><s%> Are Like <S%G3664><s%> Serpents, <S%G3789><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> Heads, <S%G2776><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> They Injure. <S%G91><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Rest <S%G3062><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Men <S%G444><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Were Not Killed <S%G615><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4127><s%> These Plagues, <S%G3778><s%> Not Even <S%G3777><s%> Repented <S%G3340><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Works <S%G2041><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5495><s%> Of Their Hands, <S%G846><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> They Should Do Homage To <S%G4352><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Demons, <S%G1140><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Idols <S%G1497><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Golden <S%G5552><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Silver <S%G693><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Brazen <S%G5470><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Stone <S%G3035><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Wooden, <S%G3585><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Neither <S%G3777><s%> To See <S%G991><s%> Are Able, <S%G1410><s%> Nor <S%G3777><s%> To Hear, <S%G191><s%> Nor <S%G3777><s%> To Walk. <S%G4043><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> They Repented Not <S%G3340><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5408><s%> Their Murders, <S%G846><s%> Nor <S%G3777><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Sorceries <S%G5331><s%> Their, <S%G846><s%> Nor <S%G3777><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4202><s%> Their Fornications, <S%G846><s%> Nor <S%G3777><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2809><s%> Their Thefts. <S%G846><s%>
